sql.if: and exists(select sa.id from sale_attribute sa left join worker w on (w.object_id = sa.number and w.status = 1 and sa.entity_attribute_id = 1) left join worker_attribute wa_j on (wa_j.domain_id = w.id and wa_j.entity_attribute_id = 1 and wa_j.status = 1) where sa.domain_id = d.id and sa.status = 1 and d.status = 1 and wa_j.text = #{map.sellerWorker})

and exists(select sa.id from sale_attribute sa left join worker w on (w.object_id = sa.number and w.status = 1) left join worker_attribute wa_r on (wa_r.domain_id = w.id and wa_r.entity_attribute_id = 6 and wa_r.status = 1) left join worker_value wv_r on (wv_r.attribute_id = wa_r.id) where sa.domain_id = d.id and sa.status = 1 and sa.entity_attribute_id = 1 and d.status = 1 and wv_r.number in (#{map.regionIds}))

and exists(select sa.id from sale_attribute sa where sa.domain_id = d.id and sa.status = 1 and d.status = 1 and sa.entity_attribute_id = 5 and year(sa.date) = year(#{map.month}) and month(sa.date) = month(#{map.month}))
and not exists(select sa.id from sale_attribute sa where sa.domain_id = d.id and sa.status = 1 and d.status = 1 and sa.entity_attribute_id = 15 and sa.number in (5, 7))

mapper.select:
select count(distinct s.object_id) from (select d.object_id
) s
